channel.title: NavyField
channel.description:
Navyfield is a massive and unique game it is based around World War 2.
What is it about? It's based around navel battle, you fight a team vs team of other real players in ships like Destroyers,Light Cruisers,Heavy Cruisers and ofcorse Battleships.
What do you do? Fight other players using you're mouse and keyboard to move,aim and shoot
Is this a bad game? No it's a 3d game and is extreamly recomended for those who like War,BF2,BF2142,COD4 and other games like that.
www.navyfield.com any other questions just ask :).

item.title: NavyField

Try to youtube it, really worth playing.
